Package net.royalur.rules.state

Interface OngoingGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll>

Type Parameters:
P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board in this game state.
S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
R - The type of rolls that may be stored in this game state.
All Superinterfaces:
GameState<P,S,R>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ActionGameState<P,S,R,A>, PlayableGameState<P,S,R,A>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOngoingGameState, MovedGameState, RolledGameState, WaitingForMoveGameState, WaitingForRollGameState
public interface OngoingGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll> extends GameState<P,S,R>
A game state from within a game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    getTurn()
    Gets the player who can make the next interaction with the game.
    default S
    getTurnPlayer()
    Retrieves the state of the player that we are waiting on to interact with the game.
    default S
    getWaitingPlayer()
    Retrieves the state of the player that is waiting for their own turn.

    describe, getBoard, getDarkPlayer, getLightPlayer, getPlayer, isPlayable
